page.title: 05REFRESHMENT IN ROTHLEY
page.content: There are{7}refreshment houses in Rothley, they are called{:The Bluebell {Inn,Rothley Court Hotel,The Woodmam's {Stroke,The Royal Oak The Red Lion,The {Old Crown,and The Limes. These are all public houses except Rothley Court. We found out some information about {The Red Lion. In{1650}it was bought as a farm house and it was changed into a public house in{1720.}It has{31}employees,{6 at the Bar,{10}Chefs, and{15}Waiters; {5}of the employees are local. They get more customers on Saturday for a meal than any other day. They have all sorts of customers, and about half of these are regulars. They open at {10:00am}and close at{2:30pm}and open up again at{6:30pm}and close at {11:30pm}for the evening trade.
